item.title: //@computicons: Algebraically, linear means: f(x + y) = f(x) + f(y), f(ax) = af(x); geometrically: rotation and stretching. The nice thing is the correspondence between linear function and matrix, you can think of matrix as a compressed form of linear function.RT @爱可可-爱生活:《线性代数、线性空间……到底何为线性？为什么在诸多概念中反复强调？ - 知乎》 http://t.cn/RI6dxjZ
item.description: //@computicons: Algebraically, linear means: f(x + y) = f(x) + f(y), f(ax) = af(x); geometrically: rotation and stretching. The nice thing is the correspondence between linear function and matrix, you can think of matrix as a compressed form of linear function. RT @爱可可-爱生活:《线性代数、线性空间……到底何为线性？为什么在诸多概念中反复强调？ - 知乎》 http://t.cn/RI6dxjZ
